man.man: Outputs manual on any given command - 'man [command]'
man.time:
Outputs current time and date - 'time [timezone]'
(timezone can be left empty to output your time)
man.weather:
Outputs current weather, high and low temperatures,
 [NEEDs TO BE FINISHED]
man.search: Opens default webbrowser with input keywords or url - 'search [keywords/url]'
man.editor:
Opens a built in basic text editor - 'editor [filepath]'
(filepath can be left empty to create a new file in documents.
If no file is given, it will create a new one)
man.stocks: Opens a built-in stock game based on real stock data - 'stocks'
man.notes: Opens a built in notes app - 'notes'
